channel.title: Science on filippo.im
channel.description: Recent content in Science on filippo.im

item.title: AI and neuroscience towards a deeper insight of human brain
item.description: ​ It was back in the year 2000 when Mel Gibson, in the movie What Women Want, due to a small accident had managed to find out what women really thought.

item.title: Dyson spheres, The key to resurrection and immortality?
item.description: ​ In a 2018 paper, researchers Alexey Turchin and Maxim Chernyakov published a paper outlining various ways humans might someday be able to achieve immortality or resurrection.

item.title: The evolution of Right and Wrong
item.description: Are people born good and then corrupted by society or born bad and then made good by society?

item.title: Finding ET
item.description: A huge amount of data made available to anyone who wants to look for possible alien signals: if there is an ET hiding among us, we will find it.

item.title: The Multiverse
item.description: The universe we live in could be very large but limited or it could be infinitely large.

item.title: News from Space
item.description: You’ve probably heard of Perseverance, the NASA rover that landed on Mars on February 18.
